alert.note: Alert for Anson; Montgomery; Richmond; Stanly (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 20 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MOORE...SOUTHERN DAVIDSON...NORTHERN ANSON...MONTGOMERY...NORTHWESTERN RICHMOND... SOUTHWESTERN RANDOLPH AND STANLY COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from Spencer to near Rockwell to near Harrisburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Albemarle, Wadesboro, Troy, Badin Lake, North Carolina Zoo, Biscoe, Ansonville, Seagrove, and Linwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
